text: For much of its history the town of Athenry ( ) was safe behind its walls, erected in the aftermath of the Second Battle of Athenry in 1316 during the height of the Bruce Wars. ==See also== *History of Ireland *1577 in Ireland *1572 in Ireland Category:Conflicts in 1572 Category:History of County Galway Category:Battles involving Ireland Category:1572 in Ireland Sack of Category:Looting Category:Razed cities
title: Sack of Athenry
